mapper.select: SELECT a.id, a.parent_id, a.parent_ids, a.name, a.sort, a.href, a.target, a.icon, a.hidden_flag, a.permission, a.create_by, a.create_date, a.update_by, a.update_date, a.remarks, a.disable_flag, a.del_flag FROM sys_menu a INNER JOIN sys_role_menu b ON a.id = b.sys_menu_id INNER JOIN sys_user_role c ON b.sys_role_id = c.sys_role_id WHERE c.sys_user_id = #{sysUserId}
